abstract: The type of card the customer uses to complete the transaction.
overview:
## Discussion

This property in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] dictionary indicates the type of payment card that the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] applies to: `"credit"`, `"debit"`, `"prepaid"`, or `"store"`. To create a modifier that works with all payment types, don’t provide a value for the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType].

The payment request uses the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] that matches the payment method that the customer chooses. For example, if the customer chooses to pay with a debit card, the payment request uses the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] with a [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType] of `"debit"`, or a modifier that doesn’t specify any [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType].

# paymentMethodType

**Instance Property**

The type of card the customer uses to complete the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayPaymentMethodType paymentMethodType;
```

## Discussion

This property in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] dictionary indicates the type of payment card that the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] applies to: `"credit"`, `"debit"`, `"prepaid"`, or `"store"`. To create a modifier that works with all payment types, don’t provide a value for the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType].

The payment request uses the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] that matches the payment method that the customer chooses. For example, if the customer chooses to pay with a debit card, the payment request uses the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] with a [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType] of `"debit"`, or a modifier that doesn’t specify any [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/paymentMethodType].

## Payment method type

- **ApplePayPaymentMethodType**: A string that represents the type of the payment method.
